name: deep-review
description: Comprehensive code review skill with 33 specialized agents for architecture, code quality, error handling, types, comments, tests, accessibility, localization, concurrency, performance, simplification, and platform-specific reviews (iOS, Android, TypeScript, Python, Rust, Go, Rails, Flutter, Java/Spring Boot, C#/.NET, PHP/Laravel, C/C++, React Native, Svelte/SvelteKit, Elixir/Phoenix, Kotlin Server, Scala) with automatic platform detection.
